lore: Sicarius is a swordsman without equal, whipping his Tempest Blade through the air in a shimmering blur of thrusts and parries. He is also the undisputed master of the lightning assault, capable of appraising the most complex tactical situation with little more than a glance and deploying his warriors with absolute confidence.

otherAbilities.name: Lead From the Front:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Scouts 6" ability and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

otherAbilities.name: Lightning Assault:
otherAbilities.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this model, if this modelâ€™s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".
